medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea for the past day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning at 1am with watery, non-bloody diarrhea. By the afternoon, the patient experienced non-bilious vomiting and abdominal pain. He has remained afebrile.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 1 diabetes, status post kidney and pancreas transplant, past cardiac catheterization and RCA stent, cataracts, AV fistula bilateral, vitrectomies.
medical_history.social_history: Reports drinking ___ drinks a week, but has not consumed any alcohol in over a week.
